charges.charge_description: 8:1324(a)(1)(A)(ii), (a)(1)(B)(i), (a)(1)(B)(iii) Transportation of Illegal Aliens for Profit with Serious Bodily Injury(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Bureau of Prisons for a term of 10 months on Counts 1 and 2, said counts to run concurrently, with credit for time served. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 3 years on Counts 1 and 2, said counts to run concurrently

charges.charge_description: 8:1324(a)(1)(A)(ii), (a)(1)(B)(i), (a)(1)(B)(iii) Transportation of Illegal Aliens for Profit with Serious Bodily Injury(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Bureau of Prisons for a term of 10 months on Counts 1 and 2, said counts to run concurrently, with credit for time served. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 3 years on Counts 1 and 2, said counts to run concurrently

charges.charge_description: 8:1324(a)(1)(A)(ii) &; (a)(1)(B)(I) and 1324(a)(1)(B)(iii)Transportation of Illegal Aliens for Profit
